original_text: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.
korean_text: 우리가 그를 힘입어 살며 기동하며 존재하느니라 너희 시인 중 어떤 사람들의 말과 같이 우리가 그의 소생이라 하니

sentences.original_text: as certain also of your own poets have said
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 시인 중 어떤 이들도 말한 바와 같습니다

sentences.original_text: For we are also his offspring
